articles.content:
Sri Lankan Preparatory Committee Inaugurated 
   Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Sri Lankan preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 in 2007 was inaugurated with due ceremony in Colombo on October 2.
 At the ceremony Amarasiri Dodangoda, minister of Justice, was elected adviser to the preparatory committee and Reggie Ranatunge, chairman of the Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association, chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee discussed and decided on the issue of briskly organizing various functions to highly praise and widely introduce the undying feats of the three generals of Mt. Paektu on the occasion of the significant holidays in 2007.

articles.content:
President of Senegal Sends Floral Basket to Statue of Kim Il Sung
   Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Abdoulaye Wade, president of Senegal and national general secretary of the Democratic Party of Senegal, sent a floral basket to the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 80th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
 Written on the ribbon of the basket were letters reading "The great President Kim Il Sung is immortal."    
 The basket was laid before the statue Tuesday.
